welcomeText1: Hi, I'm Lizandro Vivanco, a passionate web developer specialized in software development and Robotic Process Automation (RPA). Here you can explore some of my best projects and learn more about my work.
project2Description: Inventory App developed for TSC company
bioText1: I am a passionate programmer with a strong interest in web development and software engineering. Over the years, I have honed my skills in various programming languages and technologies, and I am always eager to learn more.
programmerText: As a programmer, I am detail-oriented and always strive to write clean, efficient code. I enjoy problem-solving and am particularly interested in backend development and data analysis. Collaboration and continuous learning are core to my approach, and I am always excited to tackle new challenges.
project1Desc: Description of project 1. This project involves developing a web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
project2Desc: Description of project 2. This project involves developing a mobile application using Flutter and Dart.
project3Desc: Description of project 3. This project involves developing a desktop application using C# and .NET.
project4Desc: Description of project 4. This project involves developing an RPA solution using UiPath and Python.
address: Av Horacio Zevallos, Ate Vitarte, Lima, Peru
